title: Google\Cloud\Video\Transcoder\V1beta1\SegmentSettings
name: SegmentSettings
description:
Segment settings for "ts", "fmp4" and "vtt".

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.video.transcoder.v1beta1.SegmentSettings

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.segment_duration
params.description: Duration of the segments in seconds. The default is "6.0s". Note that segmentDuration must be greater than or equal to gopDuration, and segmentDuration must be divisible by gopDuration.

params.name: data.individual_segments
params.description: Required. Create an individual segment file. The default is false.
